explore.title: Explore
explore.description: Discover stories, tips, and inspiration from every corner of the world — from family trips and dream destinations to wildlife encounters and travel challenges

map.title: Map
map.description: Explore the world through an interactive map — discover people, places, stays, and experiences, along with tips, food spots, and even movie locations.

trips.title: Trips
trips.description: Plan, track, and share your adventures — create new routes, explore suggestions, and get personalized trip recommendations

albums.title: Albums
albums.description: Collect and share your travel moments — create new albums, revisit past trips, and explore memories from friends

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: Search for friends, see blocked users, compare your travels, see suggested users

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: See your travel statistics, yearly summary, your Badges and Achievements

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: Review suggested and popular groups, create your own group(s) and manage your group(s)

community.title: Community
community.description: Check local news, updaes from your friends & community. See best tips, Local guides and take a travel survey

settings.title: Settings & Privacy
settings.blurb: Manage your account and personalize your experience — update language and currency, edit profile info, control privacy, and adjust notifications

ai.title: AI Travel Assistant
ai.description: Our smart platform helps bring your next journey to life
